Bohairic:
Availability: All chapters

Source: Horner, the Coptic Version of the New Testament in the Northern Dialect, Oxford 1898-1905. v.1 (Matthew-Mark). pp. 2-278

Editing: Diacritical signs modified by editor for grammatical accuracy.
